name: Tilted Champion and the spineless guy
name_original: Tilted Champion and the spineless guy
description:
The more damage you take the more tilted you get!

WASD to move

Move the mouse Left and Right to swipe your sword

Made for the 12 hour tilted shed game jam

with the Theme "Tilted Champion" and the  following "Scope Creep":

Athletic 

Overconfident Security

Nutty

Squirrel

Intricate

Cold

With Music by Moises Vazquez
